title: Vicksburg National Military Park: People
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     People               People       Commanders of the Vicksburg Campaign       Top - Confederate Commanders (left to right): Pemberton, Bowen, Smith, Van Dorn, Tracy, JohnstonBottom - Union Commanders (left to right): Grant, Sherman, Porter, McPherson, Logan, McClernand        Troops in the Campaign, Siege, and Defense of Vicksburg       Battery Hickenlooper        Women at Vicksburg       Left to right: Emma Balfour, Varina Davis, Alice Shirley Eaton, Almeda Summer Butler Hart, Jenny Hodgers, Theo Alice Ruggles Kitson         Order of Battle - Confederate  Order of Battle - Union
